portrait_l.name: vee
portrait_l.sjis: アタシの見事な設定に 村長も号泣間違いナシだね！
portrait_l.ascii: I've no doubt he'll be moved by my brilliant setting!

portrait_l.name: vee
portrait_l.sjis: ところで修行はどうしたんだい？
portrait_l.ascii: By the way, aren't you supposed to be training?

portrait_l.name: murno
portrait_l.sjis: 村長さんがいい人そうでよかった
portrait_l.ascii: He's seems nice What a relief

portrait_l.name: chief

sjis.partner: といい、この子といい ヴィーねえさんとこもにぎやかに なったもんだ

portrait_l.ascii: First , now this girl! Things have gotten lively at Vee's place.
